sentence.Network_en: They manifested all the busyness of a pack of beavers.

sentence.Network_en: Busyness in the King's business is no excuse for neglecting the King.
sentence.Network_cn: 在王的事上,不能把忙碌当成忽视王的借口.

sentence.Network_en: Apathetic busyness and puzzled thinking could never prevent the brilliance before.
sentence.Network_cn: 漠然的忙碌,混沌的思索,遮挡不住曾闪耀的光辉.
